title: Ticket #2214: IPv6 merge: soap_job_tests-1 times out x86_rhas_3
description:
soap_job_tests-1 fails on x86_rhas_3. All other tests passed and soap_job_tests-1 passed on all other platforms. example test, repeat failure with same binaries as last.

Branch in question: V7_7-ipv6-soap-fix-branch . It contains final changes as part of the IPv6 stage 2 work (#9). The master branch works fine without it, but it leaves an IPv4-only function call in the path.

It is entirely possible that the problem is a transient BATLab problem, or perhaps a problem with that specific machine. Steps forward might be: rebuild/retest, possibly forcing a different x86_rhas_3 machine; log into the BATLab's machine and test manually.
remarks:
2014-Jul-29 10:27:51 by adesmet:
Abandoned. Reopen if re-observed.
creator: adesmet
